tasks.task: Load grain into the wagon.
subtasks: Approach the grain pile.
Crouch down to reach the grain.
Scoop grain into the wagon using a scoop.
Repeat until the wagon is full.

tasks.task: Drive the wagon to the nearest buyers.
subtasks: Climb into the wagon seat.
Prepare the team of horses by attaching the harness.
Command the horses to move.
Navigate the zig-zag path to the buyers.

tasks.task: Unload grain at the buyers' location.
subtasks: Disengage the horses from the wagon.
Guide the wagon to the unloading area.
Open the wagon gate.
Use a pitchfork to unload the grain.
Ensure all grain is unloaded.

tasks.task: Groom the horses after hauling.
subtasks: Lead the horses to a grooming area.
Brush the horses to remove debris.
Check the horses for injuries or discomfort.

tasks.task: Prepare the wagon for the next load.
subtasks: Check the wagon's condition for any repairs needed.
Clear any residual grain from the wagon.
Lubricate hinges and moving parts.
Store the tools used, such as the scoop and pitchfork.
